basics.name: Varnit Goyal
basics.label:
Tech Lead and Senior Frontend Engineer
Targeting Staff / Principal roles
basics.summary: Tech Lead with 7+ years of experience building and architecting high-impact frontend and platform systems at fintech and consumer-scale companies.

work.name: Clearstreet
work.description: Clearstreet is a modern prime brokerage firm that provides technology-enabled execution and clearing services to clients.
work.summary: Working on platform team to make sure that the core is stable and scalable.
highlights: Core contributor on the Frontend Platform team, owning shared infrastructure used across multiple federated applications
Stabilized and scaled a micro-frontend architecture (Module Federation), improving deployment reliability and cross-app isolation
Built reusable platform capabilities (auth, feature flags, error handling, design system primitives) consumed by all frontend teams

work.name: Navi
work.description: Navi is an Indian financial services company founded by Sachin Bansal its goal is to simplify finance
work.summary: Delivering and architecting world class products.
highlights: Led architecture and delivery of large-scale React and React Native systems across collections, customer support, and KYC platforms
Designed and built an in-house Video KYC platform processing 15,000+ sessions/day, reducing TAT to 65s and eliminating system-driven abandonment
Built a UI observability platform (logs, metrics, RUM) adopted by 10+ internal teams, reducing frontend MTTR by 50%+
Architected collections portal and field agent mobile app, contributing to 99.5% collection efficiency
Designed and implemented an internal calling SDK handling 1000s of daily calls with <0.1% failure rate
Mentored 12 engineers; enabled promotions of 5 engineers across SDE levels

work.name: Razorpay
work.description: India's Leading payment gateway provider with more than 60 Billion total payment value
work.summary: Build world class product Razorpay X, which was used by the likes of Swiggy, Whatsapp, Flipkart
highlights: Promoted to Senior Frontend Engineer within 6 months based on performance and impact
Owned development of Reports and Invoice applications for Razorpay X
Redesigned and rebuilt the payouts flow, increasing conversion by 50%
Implemented Service Workers and offline support, improving resilience and load performance
Optimized build pipelines and contributed to Razorpay Xâ€™s design system and Storybook

work.name: Tokopedia (Part of Gojek)
work.description: Tokopedia is the largest Indonesian E-commerce with more than 100 millions active users
work.summary: Worked as a Software engineer, architected and delivered world class products
highlights: Designed and built Hypnos, an in-house Real User Monitoring (RUM) platform to track performance and reliability at scale
Led development of large consumer-facing verticals including Tokopoints and TokoMember, serving 100M+ active users
Developed high-traffic interactive web games for major sales campaigns, optimized to sustain 60 FPS on low-end devices
Optimized critical web pages to achieve 90+ Lighthouse scores, improving load times and user experience
Wrote comprehensive unit and integration tests using Jest and React Testing Library, achieving 75%+ coverage
Worked extensively with React, Redux, Node.js, PostgreSQL, GraphQL, and performance optimization techniques

work.name: To The New
work.description: TO THE NEW is a digital technology firm providing digital transformation and product engineering services to ISVs, Consumer Internet, and large enterprises across the globe.
work.summary: Worked as a fullstack developer mostly on React, Redux and node js
highlights: Worked for Tabcorp which is 2 largest betting company in Australia
Worked for Boston Bear develop games for their POS machines using service workers.
Worked on email unsubscribe mechanism for To the new marketing mails

awards.title: Navi Security hackathon
awards.summary: Won runner up award for navi security hackathon 2 times
